columns.name: is_enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether the security automation is enabled.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: Entity tag is used for comparing two or more entities from the same requested resource.

columns.name: actions
columns.description: A collection of the actions which are triggered if all the configured rules evaluations, within at least one rule set, are true.

columns.name: scopes
columns.description: A collection of scopes on which the security automations logic is applied. Supported scopes are the subscription itself or a resource group under that subscription. The automation will only apply on defined scopes.

columns.name: sources
columns.description: A collection of the source event types which evaluate the security automation set of rules.

columns.name: tags
columns.description: A list of key value pairs that describe the resource.
